fields.name: AadClientId
fields.description: (Metrics Advisor Only) The Azure AD Client Id (Application Id).

fields.name: AadTenantId
fields.description: (Metrics Advisor Only) The Azure AD Tenant Id.

fields.name: EventHubConnectionString
fields.description: (Personalization Only) The flag to enable statistics of Bing Search.

fields.name: QnaAzureSearchEndpointId
fields.description: (QnAMaker Only) The Azure Search endpoint id of QnAMaker.

fields.name: QnaAzureSearchEndpointKey
fields.description: (QnAMaker Only) The Azure Search endpoint key of QnAMaker.

fields.name: QnaRuntimeEndpoint
fields.description: (QnAMaker Only) The runtime endpoint of QnAMaker.

fields.name: StatisticsEnabled
fields.description: (Bing Search Only) The flag to enable statistics of Bing Search.

fields.name: StorageAccountConnectionString
fields.description: (Personalization Only) The storage account connection string.

fields.name: SuperUser
fields.description: (Metrics Advisor Only) The super user of Metrics Advisor.

fields.name: WebsiteName
fields.description: (Metrics Advisor Only) The website name of Metrics Advisor.
